stressors.name: Dating — no process

gym.current: Working well. Saturday + Tuesday (showed up, didn't work out). Today = last Phase 1 workout, then shift to Phase 2. Gloves sorted. Gym bag setup is micro-optimization.
gym.lastWeek: MAPS Anabolic Phase 1. Considering 3x/week instead of 2x. Going decent.

hair.current: Reached out to Amruta, session in next 1-2 weeks. Using Minoxidil with more intention, seeing some effects. Less stressed now.

food.current: Working well. Chila process in sync. Yogurt, blueberries, smoothies. Following the diet. Water 2-3L/day. Air fryer arrived — unopened, will try this weekend, it's an add-on not a fix. Only gap was lunch → ordered Anastasia lunchbox + bag, will pack and eat in Panjim.
food.lastWeek: Need kitchen infrastructure (air fryer, instant pot, nutribullet). Goal: 75kg. Can't eat outside due to salt/sugar restrictions. Fighting Swiggy daily. Need systems, assets, strategy.

doctors.current: Tests done, results good. HbA1c 5.8 (borderline). Kidneys improving — eGFR 60→77 (want >90). LDL 74 (want <70). Dr. Dalvi: keeping same meds, reframed medicines as support until body can carry itself. Manish reviewing, may add supplements, call coming soon.
doctors.lastWeek: Blood tests overdue. Dr. Dalvi appointment needed. Meds change. Anxiety re: kidney. Dentist. Manish call re: supplements. Need to figure out timeline.

swimming.current: Messaged Aru — she's out of town, will connect in a few days. Challenge: morning timing affecting food/work, need a system. Not a priority for December. Might start with art therapy sessions first. Guilt of not reaching out is gone.
swimming.lastWeek: On pause. Need to message Aru. Good for mood/health but unsure about bandwidth.

physiotherapy.current: Reached out to clinic. Will schedule. Not urgent — next 2-3 weeks.

massage.current: Holding off given spending this week. Need to figure out system: how much, where, how frequent. Remove decision-making. Quarterly? Six months?

therapy.lastWeek: Weekly with Mariah. Tremendously helpful. Helps with regulation.

morningSunlight.lastWeek: Need to make space. 15 min? Maybe stretch in balcony or MAPS Prime. Not happening yet.

sunset.current: Can take more seriously. Skipped yesterday and day before. Design day around it, not optional.
sunset.lastWeek: Very helpful. 30-60 min in Panjim regulates mood. Friction: commute becoming tedious.

ifs.current: Want to be more intentional. Keep here for now.
ifs.lastWeek: Helped a lot in recent months. Audiobooks happening. Practices need dedicated time. Days feel full, no container.

socialConnection.lastWeek: Short daily call (10-15 min) would help. Not being alone with own head. Potential: Ishita, Parul, Karan, Dhaarna, Aditi, Vinay.

purple.current: Call with Seth Dec 5. December closing call set for 18th. Asked about January 5th call. Front-end: Dec call, Jan call, RMF. Back-end work: next week. STRESS: (1) Setting up RMF. (2) Need to discuss stipend/finances/working arrangement with Seth.
purple.lastWeek: Anxious about messaging Seth. Wanted to get to GREEN first. Five sprints done this year. Asking 'do we need another sprint? rushing it?' Landed on: one call with Seth to celebrate 2025 and share 2026.

income.current: Need a system — like gym. Not willpower, infrastructure. Three opportunities in pipeline: (1) Karan — marketing for furnishing store, Tue meeting went well. (2) Bangalore startup training — unclear if open. (3) Mark Grimes — US founders thing. Next week: build system.
income.lastWeek: Sprint mode energy but nothing concrete. Migal proposal pending. Asking: 'If I can earn $100K/year, why am I not going full throttle? I can see my body changing with gym. Why not money?'

blog.current: Going well. Want to set up pipeline system with Claude. Not urgent — next week onwards.

dating.current: STRESS: No process. Need a system — abundance in early stage, not one person at a time (too heavy). Same pattern as income. Want a Saurabh-centered process that works anywhere — not location-dependent. Aditi: in early stage, seeing if it moves forward.
dating.lastWeek: Told Aditi you like her (that Sunday). She took it well but uncertain thing with another guy. Not sure what to do next. 'Women check me out at Starbucks — do I say hi?'

friends.current: Being cautious. Other people's energy affects decision-making. Want to be more centered first, then meet people from groundedness not need. Birthday: invited Karan, Dhaarna, Sonali, maybe Aditi. Not everyone — clarity on who I actually want.
friends.lastWeek: Threads open: Karan, Shobhna, Dhaarna, Ridima, Abhijeet. Goa social. Family/friends.

mindset.current: Self-sufficiency first, then connection. Integrity. Coming from wholeness, not from need.

closing2025.current: Marie Kondo approach. Examining commitments and identities. Recurring, not urgent.
